title: PayPal Button
shortDescription: Easily take payments, donations and offer subscriptions.
longDescription:
PayPal Button is the easy, trusted way to receive payments via your website! PayPal handles checkout, but end-users can choose from any available payment method, including credit card or offline payments. Make your button pop with custom text, colors, fonts, sizes, borders, and more!


# What are the benefits of using POWr PayPal Button?   

* **Easy to use** - Easily accept secure one-time payments and custom donation amounts through your website.
* **Customizable subscriptions** - Offer subscriptions with custom billing intervals.
* **Maximize conversions** - Maximize conversions with the user-friendly checkout interface and support for 25+ currencies.

# Get started for free and enjoy these features:   

* Accept one-time payments and donations
* Offer subscriptions
* PayPal handles checkout, but end-user can choose from any available payment method
* Support for 25+ currencies 
* Add shipping and tax
* Let buyer choose price in checkout
* Highly customizable design: pick custom colors and fonts, adjust size, add borders, and more.
* Supports text in any language.
* Mobile responsive on any device.
* Instant access to the full [POWr plugin library] (https://www.powr.io/plugins).

# Upgrade to remove POWr branding and unlock premium features, such as:   

* Additional product options
* Offer trials or add set up fees for subscriptions
* Discount codes
* Redirect after payment
* Unlock premium features in other POWr apps.

Full pricing information is available [here] (https://www.powr.io/pricing?app_type=paypal-button). 

# Why users love PayPal Button:   

"This is FABULOUS!! I am technologically pathetic and I was able to set up not one, but TWO buttons on my website. I tested them both and they worked the first time. NOTHING COULD BE EASIER! Bravo, you, for making this so fast and easy for me!" - Pamela Melusky

# Customer Support You Can Count On 

If you have any questions or need help getting PayPal Button up and running, we’re here to help! Please visit our [Help Center] (https://powr-support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us) for tips, support, and answers to common questions or contact support@powr.io.

# About POWr 

[POWr] (https://www.powr.io) brings you all the tools you need for effortless business growth, all in one place. With over 50 website plugins available that are easy-to-use and customizable, you'll find everything you need to boost conversions, engage and support customers, grow your following and collect information.
author: POWr Inc

categories.description: Apps that add functionality and services to your website.

products.title: Free
products.shortDescription: For businesses looking to test the water with new plugins
products.longDescription:
* 1 Payment Option (PayPal, Stripe, Offline)
* 1 Email Administrators
* 25 Transactions /mo
* Recurring Subscriptions

products.title: Starter
products.shortDescription: For businesses who have their own brand and want extra customization.
products.longDescription:
* Remove POWr Branding
* 3 Payment Options (PayPal, Stripe, Offline)
* 2 Email Administrators
* 50 Transactions /mo
* Recurring Subscriptions
* 1 Price Options
* Redirect after Payment
* Discount Codes
* Collect Custom Order Instructions

products.title: Pro
products.shortDescription: For growing businesses looking to stand out from the crowd and get more conversions.
products.longDescription:
* Remove POWr Branding
* 3 Payment Options (PayPal, Stripe, Offline)
* 5 Email Administrators
* 100 Transactions /mo
* Recurring Subscriptions
* 2 Price Options
* Redirect after Payment
* Discount Codes
* Collect Custom Order Instructions
* Add Trials or Setup Fees for Subscriptions
* Custom CSS & JavaScript

products.title: Business
products.shortDescription: For total control that scales with your business, whether it’s big or small. Get every feature for every plugin.
products.longDescription:
* Remove POWr Branding
* 3 Payment Options (PayPal, Stripe, Offline)
* Unlimited Email Administrators
* Unlimited Transactions /mo
* Recurring Subscriptions
* Unlimited Price Options
* Redirect after Payment
* Discount Codes
* Collect Custom Order Instructions
* Add Trials or Setup Fees for Subscriptions
* Custom CSS & JS
+ FREE Business Upgrade for all 50 POWr Plugins
